::Slayer::

Slayer nods, studying the information once again. "I will need some 
time to get the computer to shrink this enough, but here is what I 
need right now."

A datapad slides out from the computer and Slayer gives it to 
Ignatius. Among the things on it were parts of the weapon that the 
Trainers had used to enslave other bots.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius looked over the specs trying to figure out what they 
meant. To him
> it was like trying to read a foreign language. "What if we included 
a sleep
> program that would knock the target out until the reprogramming was
> complete?"
> 
> He turned his head and cocked it to the side as if that would make 
the
> picture more understandable. "Just tell me what you need and I'll 
do it." he
> said finally giving up trying to understand what he was reading.
